document.full_text: israeli strikes on the gaza strip wounded five hamas security officers and a boy on saturday after militants launched mortar bombs into israel, lightly injuring two people, gaza medics and the army said.
document.title: israeli shells hit gaza after militant mortar attack
lines_and_colors: israeli strikes on the gaza strip wounded five hamas security officers and a boy on saturday after militants launched mortar bombs into israel, lightly injuring two people, gaza medics and the army said.
